verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4909>consenting<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G336>death<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>time<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1375>persecution<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%G5037>and<s%> they <S%G1289>were<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> scattered <S%G1289>abroad<s%> <S%G2596>throughout<s%> the <S%G5561>regions<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4540>Samaria<s%>, <S%G4133>except<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2126>devout<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G4792>carried<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen<s%> to his burial, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2870>lamentation<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>As<s%> for <S%G4569>Saul<s%>, he made <S%G3075>havock<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%>, entering <S%G1531>into<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>, and <S%G4951%G5037>haling<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3860>committed<s%> them <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>.
<S%G3767%G3303>Therefore<s%> they that were scattered <S%G1289>abroad<s%> went every <S%G1330>where<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%>.
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> went <S%G2718>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G4540>Samaria<s%>, and <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G5037>And<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> gave <S%G4337>heed<s%> unto those things which <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G3004%G5259>spake<s%>, <S%G1722%G191%G846>hearing<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G991>seeing<s%> the <S%G4592>miracles<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%>, <S%G994>crying<s%> with <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, came <S%G1831>out<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> that were <S%G2192>possessed<s%> with them: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> taken with <S%G3886>palsies<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that were <S%G5560>lame<s%>, were <S%G2323>healed<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> there was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G3686>called<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%>, which <S%G4391>beforetime<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the same <S%G4172>city<s%> used <S%G3096>sorcery<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1839>bewitched<s%> the <S%G1484>people<s%> of <S%G4540>Samaria<s%>, giving <S%G3004>out<s%> that <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> great <S%G3173>one<s%>:

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> gave <S%G4337>heed<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3398>least<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G3173>greatest<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, This <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> they had <S%G4337>regard<s%>, <S%G1223>because<s%> that of <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> he had <S%G1839>bewitched<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> with <S%G3095>sorceries<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the things <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, they were <S%G907>baptized<s%>, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> when he was <S%G907>baptized<s%>, he <S%G2258%G4342>continued<s%> with <S%G5376>Philip<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1839>wondered<s%>, <S%G2334>beholding<s%> the <S%G1411>miracles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4592%G3173>signs<s%> which were <S%G1096%G1096>done<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4540>Samaria<s%> had <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, they <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>:

<S%G3748>Who<s%>, when they were come <S%G2597>down<s%>, <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3704>that<s%> they might <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>:

<S%G1063>(For<s%> as <S%G3768>yet<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1968>fallen<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G3440%G1161>only<s%> they <S%G5225>were<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.)
<S%G5119>Then<s%> laid <S%G2007>they<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2300>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> laying <S%G1936>on<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles'<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%>, he <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5536>money<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, <S%G1325>Give<s%> me <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G3739%G1437>whomsoever<s%> I <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>, he may <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4675>Thy<s%> <S%G694>money<s%> <S%G1498%G1519%G684>perish<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> thou hast <S%G3543>thought<s%> that the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G2932>purchased<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G5536>money<s%>.

<S%G4671>Thou<s%> <S%G2076>hast<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G3310>part<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G2819>lot<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3056>matter<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2117>right<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3708>perceive<s%> that <S%G4571>thou<s%> <S%G5607>art<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G5521>gall<s%> of <S%G4088>bitterness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> in the <S%G4886>bond<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%>The <S%G4042>place<s%> of the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>, He was <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G4967>slaughter<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G286>lamb<s%> <S%G880>dumb<s%> <S%G1726>before<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2751>shearer<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> opened <S%G455>he<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>:

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G2135>eunuch<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, I <S%G1189>pray<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G3004>speaketh<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>? <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> other <S%G2087>man<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G716>chariot<s%> to stand <S%G2476>still<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%>, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2135>eunuch<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G108>Azotus<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1330>passing<s%> through he <S%G2097>preached<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%>, <S%G2193>till<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%>.
